summary: Integrated existing Figma plugin with Bridge Server. Updated plugin UI to connect to Bridge Server on port 3056. Modified Bridge Server to support WebSocket connections from plugin while maintaining connection to MCP Server. Fixed WebSocket Server import issue. Bridge Server now running with both HTTP API and WebSocket endpoints. Created integration guide.
current_status: Bridge Server operational with WebSocket support. Plugin updated to connect to Bridge Server. Ready for testing: install plugin in Figma-Linux and test connection.
